text.section: Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, an authority is exempt from any requirement to pay State or local taxes or assessments on the authority's properties, activities, or any revenue from the properties or activities.
Property that an authority sells or leases to a private entity is subject to State and local property taxes from the time of the sale or lease.

The principal of and interest on bonds, the transfer of bonds, and any income derived from the bonds, including profits made on their sale or transfer, are forever exempt from all State and local taxes.
